alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 10:55PM CDT until further notice by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Texas... Coleto Creek At Arnold Road Crossing affecting Victoria and Goliad Counties. For the Coleto Creek...including Arnold Road Crossing, Highway 59, Victoria...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Coleto Creek at Arnold Road Crossing. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon, until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, major lowland flooding extends well into the flood plain, cutting off livestock. Roads and low bridges near the river are flooded and are dangerous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM CDT Friday, the stage was 7.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Saturday afternoon, crest near 16.8 feet early Sunday morning, the drop below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (10 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Coleto Creek Arnold Road Cross 15.0 7.8 Fri 9 pm 16.4 14.1 11.3 9.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
